channel.title: The DAISy Lab @ NC State
channel.description: Recent content on The DAISy Lab @ NC State

item.description: Evan is four years into the undergraduate program in Biological and Agricultural Engineering with a concentration in Bioprocessing Engineering at NC State. He is currently working on developing a scanning table for hyperspectral imaging, and measuring soil stress via deployment of UAVs. Previous projects include the development of a protein powder from sweet potato leaves, the anti-oceanic-piracy fish stink bomb, and various projects at UNCG’s Virtual Environment for Assessment and Rehabilitation Lab. Evan’s current academic interests are robotics, bio-manufacturing, programming and fermentation.
